comment: I took de Chesnay for special topics: human trafficking. She's an amazing professor, she offers easy to understand. At first, the book seems pricey, but she lets the class decide which charity to send the money too. As long as you show up, listen, and do your work, EASY A.  Even though she doesn't grade tough, she wants you to put in effort and try

Great teacher!  Very helpful.  Vulnerable populations was a very interesting class.  One of my favorite classes. Took this as a maymester. Watch your grammar on the papers.  Only 3 papers. Easy class. Loved her!!
Dr. de Chesnay is very knowledgeable and wants students to learn. Go to class, ask questions, participate in discussion. Do the background work for research on papers, proofread, and you'll be fine.
